column5: If you have a passion for mathematics and quantitative finance, and want to use it to build a lucrative career within financial research, then this is the ideal Masters for you.Building on your undergraduate studies in a quantitative subject such as economics, accounting or engineering, this course provides a research-orientated approach to finance and investment. You will delve into specialist areas such as econometrics & forecasting, financial markets & institutions, and investments & risk management, and develop advanced analytical and evaluative skills.
